channel.title: Quick tip for fast money [Updated 2/29/2012 7:57am][Req 40 Herb]
channel.description:
[s]Clean Avantoe, buy 3997 ea, clean then sell for 4148 ea.[/s] [s]Buy grimy Avantoe at 3786, clean and sell at 3990.[/s]
(2/29/2012 7:57 am) Buy grimy irits for 2067, clean and sell for 2258 ea, good luck everyone, requires 40 herb.

item.title: Quick tip for fast money [Updated 2/29/2012 7:57am][Req 40 Herb]
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:29, topic:433837”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=536555.msg3929219#msg3929219 date=1330524252]

How much money does it cost to get like 50 herblore, or whatever level u guys have to turn a profit?

It was free for me, prices go up and down on all herbs and make these small windows for profit cleaning herbs. You just have to test them by buying a grimy one, cleaning it, and selling it to see if there is a profit on that herb.

To add to this^ only do like 2k of them at a time cause prices can change quite rapidly as more people learn about the gap in prices over time.

Good tip mate, prices can change slightly to dramatically.

Update
(2/29/2012 7:57 am)
Buy grimy irits for 2067, clean and sell for 2258 ea, good luck everyone, requires 40 herb.

How much cash do you have now?
[/quote]
28m when down some from construction and summoning.[/quote]

Damn. Might as well get membership so I can be rich too…

Read full topic
item.source: Quick tip for fast money [Updated 2/29/2012 7:57am][Req 40 Herb]

item.title: Quick tip for fast money [Updated 2/29/2012 7:57am][Req 40 Herb]
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:7, topic:433837”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=536555.msg3923160#msg3923160 date=1329936368]
I would rather burn cash getting 100k exp an hour rather than 30k…
[/quote]
Cleaning herbs is up to 95k’ish xp ph. Making potions is up to 600k xp ph.
I never understood why people made pp’s for xp, yes it cheap but cleaning herbs very fast is a profit and if you want it done fast for double the cost you get 3x-4x faster depending on prices. So 2x price = 3-4x speed is kind of worth it if you do the math about how many hours saved which can be spent making money.[/quote]
Shit son, 600k xp /h? That means I could get 99 herblore in no time!

Read full topic
item.source: Quick tip for fast money [Updated 2/29/2012 7:57am][Req 40 Herb]
